thread.title: Confirmed! Anurag Kashyap set to show acting skills in 'AK Vs SK'
thread.title_full: Confirmed! Anurag Kashyap set to show acting skills in 'AK Vs SK' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Confirmed! Anurag Kashyap set to show acting skills in 'AK Vs SK'
text:
*New Delhi, Oct 19 (ANI): Bollywood versatile helmer Anurag Kashyap, who was rumored to be starring in director Vikramaditya Motwane's next 'AK Vs SK', has confirmed that he will star in the movie.*
New Delhi, Oct 19 (ANI): Bollywood versatile helmer Anurag Kashyap, who was rumored to be starring in director Vikramaditya Motwane's next 'AK Vs SK', has confirmed that he will star in the movie. When asked about the rumors surfacing about him starring in the movie, the 'Gangs of Wasseypur' director, in an exclusive interview with ANI, said, "All that is happening but have not started shooting for the movie yet." 'AK Vs SK' stands for Anurag Kashyap and Shahid Kapoor where Anurag and Shahid will be seen playing themselves in the movie. The 43-year-old director also said that he loves directing any day more than acting. Anurag's next directorial venture will be 'Raman Raghav 2:2' which will be based on the life of notorious serial killer Raman Raghav. (ANI) By Ashish Kumar Singh Â»
